data.name: No Spill Spoon With a Funnel
data.description:
Make feeding time easier and cleaner with this no-spill spoon featuring an integrated funnel design. Perfect for feeding babies or dispensing liquids without mess or waste.
🍼 Built-in funnel controls flow and prevents spills 🍲 Ideal for baby food, sauces, or purées 🧼 Easy to clean and assemble 🧴 Soft, squeezable body for controlled dispensing 🎨 Available in Blue and Green
A smart tool for parents, home cooks, and anyone needing mess-free liquid serving.

data.name: 10Pcs 5g Measuring Spoons
data.description:
A practical set of 10 measuring spoons, each with a 5g capacity — perfect for coffee, protein powder, baby formula, and more. Made from durable plastic and designed for everyday convenience.
📏 Accurate 5g measurement for consistent portions 🥄 Great for baking, cooking, or supplements 🧼 Easy to clean and reusable 🎨 Available in White, Transparent, and Pink
Ideal for kitchens, gyms, or anyone tracking intake precisely.

data.name: Fiery Mist Aroma Diffuser
data.description:
A striking ultrasonic aroma diffuser that combines calming mist with a fiery flame effect to elevate any space. Perfect for home, office, or spa settings.
🔥 Realistic flame light effect creates a cozy atmosphere 💧 Ultrasonic mist moisturizes the air and disperses essential oils 🕒 Timer and auto shut-off for safe, worry-free use 🌈 Available in sleek White or Black
Both a diffuser and a decorative piece — bring warmth and wellness together.

data.name: Stainless Steel Perfume Necklace
data.description:
A stylish stainless steel necklace that doubles as a personal perfume diffuser. Carry your favorite essential oils with you wherever you go in an elegant and functional accessory.
✨ Durable stainless steel design 🌿 Includes felt pads for absorbing and diffusing fragrance 🔄 Easy to open and refill 🎁 A thoughtful gift for aromatherapy lovers
Wear your scent with style and serenity.

data.name: Gloves with LED Lighhts
data.description:
Illuminate your tasks with these innovative LED light gloves. Perfect for working in low-light environments, outdoor adventures, or emergency repairs.
🔦 Built-in LED lights on thumb and forefinger 🧤 Comfortable, stretchable fabric for a snug fit 🔋 Battery-powered with easy on/off switch 🛠 Ideal for mechanics, electricians, campers, and more
Hands-free lighting where you need it most.

data.name: Plastic Transparent Suspended Storage Boxes - 10Pcs
data.description:
Organize your home or office with these transparent suspended storage boxes. Designed to hang underneath shelves, they maximize unused space while keeping your items visible and within reach.
📦 Set of 10 durable plastic boxes 🔍 Clear design for easy item identification 🧲 Suspended mount ideal for under shelves, cabinets, or desks 🎨 Available in multiple colors to match your style 🛠 Great for stationery, kitchen items, craft supplies, and more
A simple and elegant way to create hidden storage anywhere.

data.name: Finger Grip Exercise Tool
data.description:
Strengthen your fingers, hands, and forearms with this compact finger grip exercise tool. Perfect for athletes, musicians, or anyone recovering from hand injuries.
💪 Builds grip strength and flexibility 🎯 Ideal for rehab, climbing, guitar playing, and more 🔁 Multiple resistance levels available 🖐 Comfortable silicone material for daily use 👜 Lightweight and portable — use it anywhere
Train your grip with ease and see real results.

data.name: Flame Wallet - Kerosine
data.description:
Ignite your style with this refillable kerosene flame wallet. Perfect for magic tricks, cosplay, or a bold statement.
🔥 Produces real flame with the flick of a button 🪙 Functions as a regular wallet when flame module is removed 🔒 Secure closure with metal clasp 🔁 Refillable with standard kerosene fluid ⚠️ For responsible adult use only
Stand out with a wallet that truly sparks interest.

data.name: Reusable Pet Hair Remover
data.description:
Easily remove pet hair from furniture, carpets, and clothes. No sticky sheets or batteries needed—just roll and empty.
🐾 Effective on sofas, bedding, and car interiors 🔁 Reusable and eco-friendly design 🧼 Easy to clean with detachable hair container 💪 Durable build for long-term use
Say goodbye to lint rollers—clean smarter, not harder.

data.name: Elevated Cushoned Insole
data.description:

data.description:

data.description:

😎 Sleek, unisex design: modern and stylish frame that fits comfortably on all face shapes.

data.name: Smart IR Remote Controller Type-C
data.description:
Smart IR Remote Controller Type-C turns your smartphone into a universal remote to control TVs, air conditioners, fans, projectors, and more from one app.
🎛️ Universal Compatibility – Supports TVs, air conditioners, speakers, set-top boxes, and many other household devices ⚡ Plug & Play – Connects to your phone’s Type-C port with no batteries or setup needed 📲 App-Controlled – Use a free app to customize remotes, switch devices, and control easily 👜 Ultra-Portable – Lightweight and compact, perfect for use anywhere 💡 Smart Home Ready – Integrates with other smart devices or simplifies remote management 🔧 Compatible with Android devices supporting OTG and Type-C ports

data.name: 150ml Degreasing Wipe
data.description:

✂️ Slice through cardboard, paper, and plastic with ease 🖐️ Ergonomic grip for comfort and control 🔒 Safety blade design to avoid accidental cuts 🎨 Available in sleek Red or White — compact and portable 💼 Perfect for DIY projects, packaging, crafts, and more
Cut like a pro — no more struggling with scissors or box cutters!

data.name: ACEGMET DTX10 3-IN-1 Measuring Equipment 2.0
data.description:
ACEGMET DTX10 3-IN-1 Measuring Tool – precise, powerful, and versatile.
🛠️ 3 Functions – laser measuring, infrared scanning, and leveling. 🎯 Accurate Laser – measures up to 100 meters with pinpoint precision. 🌡️ Infrared Sensor – checks temperature. 📏 Digital Level – ensures perfect alignment. 🔋 Rechargeable Battery – long-lasting use. 💼 Rugged & Portable – built for pros and tough jobs.
🎁 Ideal for contractors, engineers, and serious DIYers.

data.name: Pikachu Car Projector
data.description:
⚡ Pikachu Car Projector — Add a Spark of Fun to Every Ride 🚗 Projects an adorable Pikachu image onto the ground when you open your door 🎥 Bright, crisp projection that works even at night 🔧 Easy installation — no drilling or wiring needed 🧲 Magnetic sensor activates with door movement 🎁 A must-have for Pokémon fans and car lovers alike
Turn heads every time you open your door — with Pikachu by your side!

data.name: 20pcs Car Wheel Reflective Stickers
data.description:
Style and safety in one – these 20pcs car wheel reflective stickers add flair and visibility to your ride.
🚗 20pcs Set – Reflective stickers designed for car, motorcycle, or bike wheels. 🌈 Vibrant Color Options – Choose from 6 bold shades to match your personal style. 💡 High Visibility – Reflective material enhances safety during night-time driving. 🌀 Easy Application – Peel-and-stick design with strong adhesive for secure placement. 🌧️ Weatherproof & Durable – Fade-resistant and built to last through rain, sun, and more.
🎁 A perfect upgrade for style-conscious drivers who value visibility and flair.

data.name: Honey Jar Pet House
data.description:
Honey Jar Pet House — Sweet Comfort for Your Furry Friend
🍯 Adorable honey jar design that adds charm to any space 🛏️ Soft plush interior for cozy naps and restful sleep 🏠 Enclosed shape creates a secure, den-like feeling 🧼 Removable cushion for easy cleaning 🧸 Ideal for small dogs, cats, or other small pets
Give your pet a home as cute as they are — comfy, warm, and irresistibly sweet!

data.name: 4pcs Heavy Duty Bedsheet Corner Tightener Clips
data.description:
4pcs Heavy Duty Bedsheet Corner Tightener Clips — No More Slipping Sheets
📌 Keep your fitted sheets perfectly in place all night 💪 Strong elastic straps and durable metal clips for a firm grip 🔄 Adjustable length to fit any mattress size or corner 🧺 Quick to install — no tools or lifting required 🧵 Gentle on fabric — won’t tear or damage your sheets
Say goodbye to messy, wrinkled bedding — sleep snug every night!

data.name: Self-Adhesive Wall Mounted Toothpaste Squeezer
data.description:
Self-Adhesive Wall Mounted Toothpaste Squeezer — No Waste, No Mess
💧 Easy to install — sticks firmly on any smooth surface 🖐️ One-handed operation to squeeze every last drop ♻️ Saves toothpaste and money by reducing waste 🚿 Compact design fits perfectly in any bathroom 🧼 Easy to clean and refill

data.name: Water Rocket
data.description:
Experience the thrill of launching a water rocket into the sky with our safe and exciting water-powered system!
💧 Powered by water pressure for a fun and educational experience. 🌿 Eco-friendly and reusable design for a guilt-free adventure. 🛠️ Easy assembly and launch for all ages - perfect for family fun or science projects. 🎯 Great for outdoor play, teaching kids about physics, and creating unforgettable memories. Get ready for liftoff!

data.name: Water Ripple Effect Lamp
data.description:
Water Ripple Effect Lamp — Relaxing and mesmerizing ambient light
🌊 Creates soothing ripple water effects to enhance any room ✨ Perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, or meditation spaces 🔌 Easy to use with USB power supply 🎨 Adds a calming and stylish atmosphere to your space
Set the mood with gentle, flowing water-like illumination.

data.name: Dancing Skeleton
data.description:
🎃 Dancing Skeleton — Fun and spooky decoration for Halloween or parties
💃 Animated skeleton figure that dances to entertain 🌈 Available in multiple colors: Green, White, Purple, Pink 🔋 Battery powered and easy to place anywhere 🕺 Adds a playful vibe and a touch of eerie fun to your space

data.name: Nessie
data.description:
Nessie 🦕 — Cute and quirky monster-shaped lamp inspired by the Loch Ness legend
💡 Soft, warm LED light perfect for kids’ rooms, nightlights, or decor 👌 Compact design with easy touch control for on/off and brightness ✨ Adds a whimsical, cozy atmosphere to any space 🔋 Battery powered for portable use or 🔌 USB powered for convenience

data.name: Mario Power-Up Cube Lamp
data.description:
Nostalgic Mario Power-Up Cube Lamp inspired by classic video game design. Features a glowing cube with iconic question mark symbol, bringing retro charm to your space.
🎮 Three-color RGB display (glowing cube) 💡 Classic design with nostalgic appeal 🕹️ Perfect for gaming rooms, desks, or kids’ bedrooms as an ambient light source 🔌 Compact size with easy USB power connection and soft LED illumination

data.name: Bugs the Bunny Love Keychain
data.description:
Bugs the Bunny Love Keychain – cute and playful accessory.
💖 Perfect Gift – great for fans or to add charm to your keys. 🔑 Lightweight & Durable – lovely design made to last.
🎁 Ideal for everyday use or as a collectible keepsake.

data.name: Jellyfish Flame Humidifier
data.description:
Jellyfish Flame Humidifier with mesmerizing flame effect
💨 Adds moisture and a cozy glow to your room 🌈 Colorful LED lights create a relaxing atmosphere 🔌 Easy USB power connection for convenience ✨ Perfect for bedrooms, offices, or meditation spaces

data.name: RC Fighter Jet Drone
data.description: ✈️ RC Fighter Jet Drone with realistic design 🎮 Easy remote control for smooth flying ⚡ High-speed performance with stable flight 🔵 Available in Blue and Green colors 🌟 Perfect gift for drone enthusiasts and kids 🚀 Experience thrilling aerial maneuvers

data.name: Insect Cather
data.description:
Insect Catcher – catch and release bugs without the mess.
🧹 No Squishing – trap insects from a distance without touching. 🛡️ Safe & Eco-Friendly – no chemicals, great for kids and pets. 📏 Extra Reach – long handle grabs bugs in hard-to-reach spots. 🌈 Color Options – Black, White, Blue, or Yellow. 💡 Easy to Use – just aim, squeeze, and release.

data.name: Car AC-Outlet Cartoon Characters
data.description:
Fun and functional car AC outlet clips featuring classic cartoon characters.
🎉 Add Personality – decorate vents with Tom, Jerry, Spike, or Doraemon. 🌬️ Easy to Attach – clips onto most standard air vents. 😍 Cute & Eye-Catching – brings smiles on every drive. 💨 Stylish & Practical – looks great while allowing airflow.
🎁 A perfect gift for car lovers and cartoon fans.

data.name: 10pcs Portable Nail Clipper Set
data.description:
Grooming made easy, wherever you go – with this 10-piece portable nail clipper set.
💅 Complete Care Kit – Includes clippers, files, scissors & more – everything you need for nail and cuticle care. 👜 Travel-Friendly – Lightweight, compact, and perfect for home, travel, or your bag. 🌈 Stylish Colors – Choose from Lime, Silver, Pink, or Green to match your vibe. 🔒 Organized & Secure – Neat protective case keeps tools clean and accessible. 🧼 Durable & Hygienic – High-quality stainless steel tools that are easy to clean and built to last.
🎁 Perfect as a gift for anyone who loves staying neat, polished, and prepared on the go.

data.name: Bird Shaped Juicer
data.description:
Bird Shaped Juicer – cute and easy to use.
🐦 Adorable Design – adds charm to your kitchen. 💪 Efficient Squeeze – extracts juice with little effort. 🧼 Easy to Clean – smooth surface for quick cleanup. 🧳 Compact & Handy – perfect for home or travel.
A fun gift for juice lovers and home cooks.

data.name: Rotating Table Tray
data.description:
Rotating Table Tray designed to save space and keep essentials within reach. Perfect for dining, organizing, and adding convenience to your home.
🔄 360° Rotation – Effortlessly access condiments, snacks, or essentials 🏡 Versatile Use – Ideal for dining tables, countertops, or vanity setups ✨ Premium Finish – Durable and modern to match any home décor 📏 Generous Surface – Fits bottles, jars, or utensils without crowding 🧽 Easy Maintenance – Wipe-clean surface for hassle-free upkeep 🎁 Great Gift – Perfect for hosts, organizers, or home improvement lovers

data.name: Construction Equipment Tableware
data.description:
Construction Equipment Tableware Set – fun mealtime for kids.
👷 Kid-Friendly Design – fork-lift forks, bulldozer pushers & more. 🍽️ Complete Set – plate, fork, spoon & pusher styled like construction tools. 💪 Durable & Safe – BPA-free, food-grade materials. 🧽 Easy to Clean – dishwasher-safe.
Perfect gift for toddlers and construction-loving kids. Encourages self-feeding through play.

data.name: Metatarsal Toe Separator Pads
data.description:
Relieve foot pain with every step using our Metatarsal Toe Separator Pads. Cushions and supports forefoot pressure points for all-day comfort.
🦶 Three-layer design (cushioning, support, and alignment) 👣 Soft & breathable gel for long-lasting comfort 📏 Multiple sizes available to fit your foot shape 💡 Invisible fit design with slim profile fits discreetly inside most shoes 🚀 Ideal for walkers, runners, and individuals with forefoot or toe pain

data.name: Motorcycle Side Stand Shoe
data.description:
Motorcycle Side Stand Shoe prevents your kickstand from sinking into soft ground, gravel, or hot asphalt. Reliable support designed for safe parking anywhere.
🛡️ Anti-Sink Design – Keeps your kickstand stable on soft or uneven surfaces 🔩 Durable Build – Made from high-strength ABS plastic for lasting use 🌈 Multiple Colors – Choose from 10 vibrant options to match your bike’s style 🧳 Compact & Portable – Lightweight and easy to carry in your gear bag or pocket 🚦 Universal Fit – Compatible with most standard motorcycle kickstands 🧼 Easy to Clean – Simple rinse removes mud, dust, or debris after use

data.name: Cat Door Handle Holder
data.description:
Cat Door Handle Holder – lets your cat roam safely.
🚪 Keeps Doors Ajar – prevents your cat from getting stuck. 🐱 Pet-Friendly – avoids tail pinching and lock-ins. 🛠️ Easy Install – hooks over any standard door handle. 💪 Durable Elastic – fits most door setups. 🧼 Easy to Clean – wipes clean in seconds.
🎁 A handy tool for pet owners who want convenience and safety.

data.name: Inflatable Pregnancy Pillow
data.description:
Inflatable Pregnancy Pillow – total comfort for expecting moms.
🌬️ Inflatable Design – easy to inflate, deflate, and store. 🛌 Full-Body Support – supports belly, back, hips, and legs. 🌈 Color Options – Light-Brown, Blue, or Pink. 🌿 Skin-Friendly – soft, safe PVC for long use. 🧳 Travel-Friendly – great for home or hospital bags.
Perfect for prenatal massage and face-down relaxation.

data.name: Pigeon Soap Dispenser
data.description:
Add a touch of charm to cleanliness with our Pigeon Soap Dispenser. The dispenser features a unique pigeon design that adds a playful twist to handwashing.
🕊️ Quirky soap dispenser (unique pigeon design) 🧼 Fun & functional design for kitchens, bathrooms, or kids’ sinks 📦 Two color options: sleek White or playful Coloured to match your space 💡 Easy refill with twist-off design for hassle-free refills 🌟 Durable and safe made from high-quality, non-toxic ABS plastic

data.name: How To Train Your Dragon Car Decoration
data.description:
How To Train Your Dragon Car Decoration – ride with Toothless in style.
🚗 Dashboard Buddy – brings charm and fun to your car. 🎨 Custom Sizes & Colors – 20cm, 27cm, or 35cm in Black or White. 🌟 Eye-Catching – detailed sculpting with expressive eyes. 💨 Strong Grip – stays in place even on sharp turns.
A great gift for dragon fans, fantasy lovers, or quirky decor collectors.

data.name: Double-Ended Dog Leash
data.description:
Double-Ended Dog Leash – control and comfort for every walk.
🐶 Maximum Control – perfect for training or walking two dogs. 🔁 Dual Clips – use both ends to avoid tangles. 💪 Durable – heavy-duty nylon with reinforced stitching. 🧩 Adjustable Length – close control or more freedom. 🖐️ Comfortable Grip – padded handle for no rope burns. 🧳 Travel-Ready – lightweight and foldable.
🎁 Great for all dog breeds, big or small.

data.name: Airtag Insoles
data.description:
Airtag Insoles – discreet tracking for peace of mind.
📍 Hidden Pocket – securely holds your Apple Airtag. 🕵️‍♂️ Invisible Protection – Airtag fully hidden in the heel. 🏃‍♀️ Comfortable – breathable, shock-absorbing material. ✂️ Custom Fit – trim-to-fit for any shoe size. 🔒 Secure – keeps Airtag snug during every step. 👟 Universal Fit – works in sneakers, boots, or casual shoes. 🧒 Ideal for kids and elderly for safer outings.
🎁 A smart safety solution for peace of mind on the go.

data.name: Soap Bar Scraper
data.description:
Soap Bar Scraper helps you use every last bit of your soap, eliminating waste.
♻️ No More Soap Waste – Scrapes slippery slivers into usable flakes 💡 Innovative Design – Built-in grater turns soap scraps into fine pieces for lathering or remolding 🧽 Easy to Use – Ergonomic handle and sharp stainless-steel blade make shredding effortless 🚿 Clean & Hygienic – Keeps soap dishes mess-free and prevents bacteria buildup 🌍 Eco-Friendly – Extends soap life and reduces waste 🧼 Great for Homemade Soap – Ideal for DIY soap blending 🛁 Bathroom and Laundry Essential – A practical tool for every household

data.name: SpiderMan Web-Shooter Water Gun
data.description:
Transform into your friendly neighborhood SpiderMan with our action-packed water blaster. The web-shooter features a wrist-mounted design that's easy to use and refill.
🕷️ Water blaster (wrist-mounted design) 💦 Refillable and trigger-activated for fast-paced fun 👦 Perfect for kids: safe, lightweight, and endlessly entertaining 🎁 Awesome gift idea: a must-have for young superheroes and Marvel fans alike!

data.name: Waterproof Shower Phone Holder
data.description:
Say goodbye to phone-drops in the shower! 🚿 Introducing our waterproof shower phone holder — perfect for watching, scrolling, or calling hands-free.
📱 Watch your favorite show, check messages, or video call with friends while you wash. 💧 100% Waterproof Designed with a sealed silicone casing to protect your phone from water and steam. 🌀 Full Rotation Rotate up to 360° for optimal viewing angles — easy peasy! 🛠️ Easy Wall Mount Comes with strong adhesive pads — no tools required! 📏 Universal Fit Compatible with phones up to 6.8 inches. 🎨 Choose Your Style Available in sleek Black, clean White, or cute Pink.

data.name: 500ml Ice Cube Mold Bottle
data.description:
500ml Ice Cube Mold Bottle – freeze and serve with one smart bottle.
🌀 Twist-to-Release – Fill, freeze, twist, and pour – quick and easy. 🧽 Easy to Clean – BPA-free, non-stick silicone interior. 🎨 Stylish Colors – Green, White, or Pink to match your vibe. 🍹 Versatile Use – Great for home, gym, or on-the-go – fits most cup holders. ♻️ Eco-Friendly – Reusable design cuts down on waste.
🎁 A clever gift for anyone who loves cool drinks without the mess.

data.name: Waterproof Rubber Cover For Shoes
data.description:
Protect your kicks from water and mud with our waterproof rubber shoe covers!
💧 100% Waterproof Silicone: keep your shoes dry in any condition. 🦶 Anti-Slip Grip: textured soles for stability on wet and slick surfaces. 🔁 Reusable & Eco-Friendly: durable stretch-fit design for a guilt-free experience. 🧳 Compact & Travel-Friendly: folds neatly into bags, backpacks, or glove compartments.
Available Sizes: S, M, L. Perfect for commuting, cycling, festivals, and more.

data.name: Silicone Door Handle Anti-COlision Cover
data.description:
Silicone Door Handle Anti-Collision Cover protects walls and handles from dents, scuffs, and unwanted impact noise. Perfect for homes, offices, or rental spaces.
🛡️ Soft, Shock-Absorbing Silicone – Cushions every swing to prevent damage 🧲 Easy Slip-On Fit – Flexible design stretches to fit most standard handles 🌈 Stylish Protection – Available in Grey, Blue, or Yellow to match your space 🧼 Washable & Reusable – Keeps your home neat, quiet, and damage-free

data.name: Shirt Button Aid Tool Hook
data.description:
Compact tool that makes buttoning shirts easier and faster for those with limited dexterity. Designed for everyday use and comfortable handling.
🪝 Effortless buttoning with wire loop 💪 Ideal for arthritis, recovery, or limited mobility 🖐️ Ergonomic grip for control and comfort 🎨 Multiple types for small or standard buttons

data.name: Weight Lifting Hook Grip
data.description:
Take your weightlifting game to the next level! Maximize your lifts with better grip and wrist support.
🔒 Secure Hook Design Heavy-duty steel hooks reduce finger fatigue and enhance pulling power. 🧤 Wrist Support Padded straps protect joints and stabilize your wrists during heavy lifts. 💪 Ideal for Deadlifts & Pull-Ups Improve your deadlifts and pull-ups with more power and control. Crush back day like a pro! 🔁 One-Size-Fits-Most Adjustable fit for men and women of all levels.

data.name: Dancing Octopus
data.description:
🐙 Dancing Octopus Toy – a fun dance buddy for kids.
🎵 Music & Motion – plays tunes and wiggles tentacles. 🎨 Cute Colors – available in Green, Yellow, or Pink. 🧠 Interactive – promotes movement and sensory play. 🔋 USB Rechargeable – no batteries needed.
🎁 A delightful gift for toddlers and up.

data.name: 3 in 1 Cleaning Brush
data.description: 🧼 3 in 1 Cleaning Brush Your all-in-one solution for cleaning tight spaces and tricky corners! 🧽 Triple Functionality Features a bristle brush, scraping tool, and detail cleaner in one compact design. 🚪 Perfect for Tracks & Gaps Cleans window sills, keyboard grooves, sink edges, and more with ease. 💧 Ergonomic Grip Comfortable, easy-to-hold handle makes cleaning faster and more effective. 🎨 Available Colors Choose from Grey, Green, or Blue to match your style

data.name: Boat Motor Stirrer For Mugs
data.description: 🚤 Boat Motor Mug Stirrer Stir your drink with a splash of fun! ☕ Perfect for Coffee & More Mixes coffee, milk, cocoa, or protein shakes with ease—just like a mini blender! 🌀 Boat Motor Design Features a playful outboard motor look that actually spins when turned on. 🧼 Easy to Clean Detachable and washable propeller makes cleanup effortless. 🎁 Great Gag Gift A hilarious yet functional gift for boat lovers and coffee enthusiasts alike!

data.name: KastKing Osage Polarized Sport Sunglasses
data.description:
KastKing Osage polarized sport sunglasses designed for outdoor adventures and fishing.
🕶️ Polarized Lenses reduce glare on water, making it easier to spot fish and enhance visual clarity. 💪 Durable & Lightweight Frame built for comfort and long-lasting performance during active use. 🌊 Outdoor-Ready, ideal for fishing, boating, hiking, or driving under bright conditions.
🎨 Multiple Color Options Choose Brown, Orange, Blue, or Green to match your style and environment.

data.name: Hoodie With Built-In Backpack
data.description:
Hoodie With Built-In Backpack – stylish and practical in one.
🎒 Integrated Backpack – carry essentials without a separate bag. 🔒 Hidden Pockets – zip compartments keep items secure. 👕 Comfy Fit – soft, breathable fabric in sizes M to XXXL. 🌦️ All-Weather Wear – great for travel, festivals, and daily use.
A smart pick for minimalists, students, and adventurers.

data.name: Funny Dog Shorts
data.description:
Funny Dog Shorts – comfy, bold, and sure to get laughs.
😂 Hilarious Design – 3D dog print that looks like it's peeking out. 🩳 Comfy & Lightweight – breathable fabric for lounging or the gym. 📏 Wide Size Range – from XXS to XXXL. 🌈 Bold & Unique – a fun conversation starter.
Great gift for dog lovers and pranksters.

data.name: Prank Reverse-Firing Water Gun
data.description: 😈 Prank Reverse-Firing Water Gun The ultimate trickster's weapon of choice! 🔄 Shoots *backward* — not forward! Aim it at a friend and soak… yourself! 💦 Hilariously deceptive Looks like a regular water gun, but turns the tables instantly. 🧠 Perfect for prank wars Ideal for surprising friends, family, or coworkers who think they’re safe. 😂 Durable and reusable Built for repeat laughs and harmless mayhem. 🎁 Great gag gift Add it to your prankster arsenal or gift it to your mischievous bestie!

data.name: Hoodie Woodie
data.description:
Hoodie Woodie – flannel look, hoodie comfort.
🔄 All-in-One – looks layered, but it’s a single hoodie. 🧥 Lumberjack Style – rugged vibe with zero effort. 😂 Fun & Cozy – perfect for parties, pranks, or lazy days. 🧶 Soft & Breathable – comfy enough for all-day wear.
A funny, functional gift for flannel fans and jokesters.
